title: John Cena Eats Two Mark Wahlbergs
itunes:title: John Cena Eats Two Mark Wahlbergs
description:
On "That Scene with Dan Patrick", actor and Professional Wrestler John Cena joins Dan to discuss the hilarious scene in "Trainwreck", where he gets into a verbal altercation with someone sitting behind him and Amy Schumer at the movie theatre. He details how much of the scene was scripted and how much was improv, how he crafted the "Steven" character, his favorite lines from the movie, Mark Wahlberg comparisons, and the film's awkward sex scene. John also discusses the similarities between his acting and wrestling career, the passion of WWE fans, and the names of former wrestlers that he'd love to get into the ring with. Hear it first on Amazon Music.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
